ideas.title: Personal Intelligence in AI Mode in Search: Help that's uniquely yours
ideas.description: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/pcontext_sizzle_thumbnail.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Personal Intelligence lets you tap into your context from Gmail and Photos to deliver tailored responses in Search, just for you.
hooks: 5 Mind-Blowing Ways AI Personalizes Your Search Experience
How Personal Intelligence Transforms Google Search Forever
Unlock Hyper-Personalized Search: AI's Next Frontier

tips: Use personal anecdote about search personalization in intro
Include real-time screenshot of personal AI search results
Create interactive poll about reader's search experiences
Optimize headline with clear numerical promise (5 Ways...)
Include expert quotes from Google AI researchers
Add deep-dive technical breakdowns between list items
Frame content as professional productivity enhancement
Include enterprise/professional use cases
Add credibility with data points about AI search efficiency

visualDirection.description: Bold, futuristic design with dynamic gradients, holographic overlays, clean tech-inspired typography. Use soft blues and electric whites. Incorporate subtle motion graphics showing personalization transitions. Minimalist infographic style with high-contrast elements representing AI contextual understanding.

exampleOutline: Section 1: Provocative Opening - The Search Revolution

ideas.title: From invisibility cloaks to AI chips: Neurophos raises $110M to build tiny optical processors for inferencing
ideas.description: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math required in AI inferencing tasks.
hooks: Invisible Tech: How Light Could Revolutionize AI
Optical Chips: The Future of Machine Intelligence
Neurophos: Reinventing Computing with Photonic Wizardry
